articles.title: Cody Gakpo reveals reasons why he rejected Leeds United transfer on deadline day - MOT Leeds News
articles.description: Cody Gakpo has revealed that he rejected Leeds United and other Premier League clubs on deadline day because a transfer felt rushed, while speaking to PSV.
articles.content:
Cody Gakpo has revealed that he rejected Leeds United and other Premier League clubs on deadline day because a transfer felt rushed, while speaking to PSV.

articles.author: Craig Hope
articles.title: Eddie Howe accuses Premier League rivals of inflating transfer fees in bid to deny Newcastle success - Daily Mail
articles.description: Eddie Howe insisted that 'everyone is against us' after Newcastle failed to bring in a number of players during the summer transfer window - accusing rivals of inflating transfer fees.
articles.content: Eddie Howe has revealed that Premier League rivals are refusing to do Newcastle any favours since the Saudi-led takeover and accused them of inflating transfer fees for his club, admitting 'everyone … [+5195 chars]
